DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine safety feasibility immunization autologous tumor lysate-pulsed dendritic cell vaccine patient non-small cell lung cancer . - Determine immunologic response patient treat vaccine . OUTLINE : Patients undergo surgery remove gross evidence tumor . Two month surgery ( 4 month chemotherapy and/or radiotherapy require ) , patient undergo leukapheresis . Peripheral blood mononuclear cell isolate culture interleukin-4 sargramostim ( GM-CSF ) generate dendritic cell ( DC ) . DC pulse tumor lysate prepare previously remove tumor . Patients receive autologous tumor lysate-pulsed DC vaccine subcutaneously twice , 4 week apart . Patients follow every 4 month 2 year , every 6 month 1 year , annually thereafter . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 10 patient accrue study within 2 year .
